Title: The Alchemist (No. 101)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Anthony Sparks, Jason George (executive story editor), Amanda Kate Shuman (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: As Red (James Spader) enlists activist whistleblowers in his search for the mole, Liz (Megan Boone) pursues a deranged scientist who's helped dozens of criminals escape by engineering and killing their genetic doubles.
